TestDescription.name: MySQL Community Server 5.0 to 5.0.45 multiple vulnerabilities
TestDescription.Description: The remote database server is susceptible to multiple attacks. [break] The version of MySQL Community Server installed on the remote host is affected by a denial of service and a privilege escalation vulnerability.
TestDescription.Impact: The remote attacker may crash the server with a special crafted password packet and/or create arbitrary tables using the affected application.
TestDescription.Recommendation: Upgrade to MySQL Community Server version 5.0.45 or later.
